official_title: Supporting the goals and ideals of National Assisted Living Week.

summary.text: Supports the goals and ideals of National Assisted Living Week. Urges all people of the United States to: (1) visit friends and loved ones who reside at assisted living facilituies; and (2) learn more about assisted living services, including how assisted living services benefit communities in the United States.

titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of National Assisted Living Week.
